keywordspec.name: FileLibrary
keywordspec.doc:
FileLibrary is a Robot Framework test library for generating test data files.
Built in variables: ${now}, ${today}
For SQL related commands, you can specify SQL satements either directly in the argument or provide them in an .sql file.
| *IMPORTANT* | For statements included directly in the test case, you need to escape any template data variables. If you do not, it will not be able to find the value. | | _Example_ | Execute SQL update mytable set value = 2 where id = \${my_id} |

kw.name: Concatenate Files
kw.doc:
Concatenate multiple files into a single file.
Usage: | Concatenate Files | _targetFile_ | _sourceFile1_ | _sourceFile2_ | | Concatenate Files | _targetFile_ | _sourceFile1_ | _sourceFile2_ | _sourceFile3_ |

kw.name: Connect
kw.doc: Connect to database using the specified arguments

kw.name: Execute Query
kw.doc: Execute SQL Query. Returns a list of values. When the query selects a single column, a simple list of values is returned. When the query selects multiple columns a list of lists is returned. Example usage: | @{singleColResult}= | Execute Query | select 1 from dual union select 2 from dual | | Log Many | @{singleColResult} | | | @{multiColResult}= | Execute Query | select 1,2 from dual union select 3,4 from dual | | Log Many | ${singleColResult[2]} | |

kw.name: Execute SQL
kw.doc: Execute SQL INSERT or UPDATE statement(s). Specify either an SQL directly or the path to a .sql file.

kw.name: Generate File
kw.doc:
Generate a file based on a Freemarker template. Before using this keyword, you need to populate the Template Data using the Set Template Data... keywords. All template data that is available can be referenced from within the Freemarker template using variables. E.g. ${soup.color}
Usage: | Generate File | _templateFile_ | _outputFile_ |

kw.name: Get Template Data
kw.doc: Get a specific value from the template data context.

kw.name: Log Template Data
kw.doc: Print all content of the template data as JSON. When an optional file name argument is supplied, the template context is also saved as a JSON File.

kw.name: Reset Template Data
kw.doc: Clear the template data. All existing data. When the optional argument True is given; the cleared template data will be preloaded with test variables.

kw.name: Set Query Time Out
kw.doc: Set query timeout. Default timeout is 30 seconds.

kw.name: Set Template Data
kw.doc: Set a variable in the template context. The value can be either a string or a JSON string.

kw.name: Set Template Data From SQL
Verify Files Are Equal
kw.doc:
Verify that the content of two files matches. Files are compared line by line.
Usage: | Verify Files Are Equal | _file1_ | _file2_ |

kw.name: Verify SQL Result
kw.doc: Execute a SQL statement or .sql file and verify that returned values match the expected values.

kw.name: Verify XML Files Are Equal
kw.doc:
Verify that the content of two xml files matches. Whitespace and formatting is ignored. Replace values of nodes or attributes with the string #{IGNORE} to exclude them from comparisson. Provide xpath filters to exclude certain nodes from comparison. (only basic xpath support)
Usage: | Verify XML Files Are Equal | _file1_ | _file2_ | | Verify XML Files Are Equal | _file1_ | _file2_ | _xpathFilter1_ | Verify XML Files Are Equal | _file1_ | _file2_ | _xpathFilter1_ | _xpathFilter2_

kw.name: Zip Files
kw.doc:
Compress multiple files into a single zip file.
Usage: | Compress Files | _targetFile_ | _sourceFile1_ | | | | Compress Files | _targetFile_ | _sourceFile1_ | _sourceFile2_ | _sourceFile3_ |
